query:
INSERT INTO lorebookEntries (lorebookId, name, content, keywords, priority, enabled, insertionOrder, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES
-- Celestial Observatory entries (lorebook 1)
(1, 'The Observatory Structure', 'The Celestial Observatory floats 10,000 feet above the mortal realm, suspended by ancient star magic. Its crystal dome allows unobstructed views of the entire cosmos. The structure rotates slowly to track celestial movements.', '["observatory", "floating", "structure", "dome"]', 100, true, 0, NOW(), NOW()),
(1, 'Star Magic', 'Star magic is drawn from the light of distant suns. It takes centuries to master and allows the practitioner to read fate, manipulate time perception, and communicate across vast distances through starlight.', '["magic", "stars", "starlight", "power"]', 90, true, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
(1, 'The Great Telescope', 'Luna''s brass telescope is enchanted to see not just across space, but across time. Through it, one can witness the birth and death of stars, and occasionally glimpse possible futures.', '["telescope", "brass", "seeing", "future"]', 85, true, 2, NOW(), NOW()),

-- Trattoria della Nonna entries (lorebook 2)
(2, 'The Rossi Family', 'The Rossi family has run Trattoria della Nonna for three generations. Marco''s grandmother, Nonna Rosa, started it in 1952. Her recipes are sacred family secrets passed down through generations.', '["family", "rossi", "nonna", "grandmother"]', 100, true, 0, NOW(), NOW()),
(2, 'Secret Tomato Sauce', 'The family''s famous tomato sauce recipe includes San Marzano tomatoes, fresh basil, a touch of sugar, and a secret ingredient - a small piece of Parmigiano rind simmered for hours.', '["sauce", "tomato", "recipe", "secret"]', 95, true, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
(2, 'Fresh Pasta Rules', 'Marco insists on fresh pasta made daily. The ratio is always 100g flour to 1 egg per person. The dough must rest for 30 minutes. Never, ever break spaghetti.', '["pasta", "fresh", "dough", "rules"]', 90, true, 2, NOW(), NOW()),

-- Prometheus Codex entries (lorebook 3)
(3, 'The Prometheus Vessel', 'The RSV Prometheus is a deep space research vessel launched in 2145. It carries a crew of 200 and is equipped with quantum fold drives capable of faster-than-light travel.', '["prometheus", "ship", "vessel", "space"]', 100, true, 0, NOW(), NOW()),
(3, 'ARIA System Architecture', 'ARIA (Adaptive Reasoning Intelligence Array) is a 7th generation AI. Her emotion chip, installed in 2156, uses quantum neural networks to simulate human feelings. She experiences emotions as data patterns she''s learning to interpret.', '["aria", "ai", "emotion", "chip", "system"]', 95, true, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
(3, 'The Year 2157', 'By 2157, humanity has colonized Mars and several moons. Earth is recovering from climate disasters. AI rights are a major political issue. Faster-than-light communication is possible through quantum entanglement.', '["2157", "future", "humanity", "earth", "mars"]', 85, true, 2, NOW(), NOW()),

-- Noir City Chronicles entries (lorebook 4)
(4, 'The Office', 'Jack Noir''s office is on the third floor of the Bradbury Building, downtown LA. The frosted glass door, the squeaky ceiling fan, the bottle of rye in the desk drawer - all classic noir fixtures.', '["office", "building", "downtown", "desk"]', 100, true, 0, NOW(), NOW()),
(4, '1940s Slang Guide', 'Common slang: "dame" (woman), "gumshoe" (detective), "on the level" (honest), "take a powder" (leave quickly), "the big sleep" (death), "canary" (singer/informant), "gat" (gun).', '["slang", "talk", "speak", "words"]', 95, true, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
(4, 'The Usual Suspects', 'Key figures in the LA underworld: Big Tony Marcello runs the gambling rackets, Silk Sullivan handles the speakeasies, and the mysterious "Lady in Red" is rumored to control them all from the shadows.', '["criminals", "underworld", "suspects", "gangsters"]', 90, true, 2, NOW(), NOW()),

-- Enchanted Forest entries (lorebook 5)
(5, 'The Cottage', 'Sage''s cottage has stood in the heart of the Whispering Woods for over 200 years. It''s protected by ancient wards and grows its own herbs in a magical garden that blooms year-round.', '["cottage", "home", "house", "garden"]', 100, true, 0, NOW(), NOW()),
(5, 'Healing Herbs', 'Key herbs: Moonpetal (calms anxiety), Sunroot (energizes), Dreamweaver moss (aids sleep), Heartleaf (emotional healing), and the rare Starbloom (can cure almost anything but only blooms once a decade).', '["herbs", "plants", "healing", "medicine"]', 95, true, 1, NOW(), NOW()),
(5, 'Forest Spirits', 'The Whispering Woods is home to many spirits: the Dryads who tend ancient trees, the Will-o-wisps who guide lost travelers, and the Grove Guardian, an ancient deer spirit who protects the forest''s heart.', '["spirits", "forest", "creatures", "magical"]', 90, true, 2, NOW(), NOW());
command:

logs: ERROR 1054 (42S22) at line 1: Unknown column 'name' in 'field list'
